name: Gemini (itch) (Walking Owl Studios)
description:
The twins, Castor and Pollux travers through space to get to the goal. However, they will travel at the same time in the opposite direction. 

Click on a Twin to begin drawing a Line! 

Aim of each Level is to connect each Twin to their Goal! 

Avoid these Void Spaces! 

Press Shift to reverse the way the Line is drawn!
